My mentor and I decided the tasks for this week given as : * Need to Discuss/Think more about the default Caption value * Need to Discuss/Think more about the default Caption display for the unaligned context

Apart from this, I have decided to add the following features * CRUD for the Admins * Can see all the experiemnts * Can add user * Delete User * Check experiments for each users * See profile of Each User * Added Gravatars for each user to make the UI attractive

In this week and the next week I will be adding details of each feature along with screenshots as I completed them.
